verses.text: Masanil juntzanh tik ix wil wal yet' in sat, ix wab' wal yet' in chiquin.
Ha tas eyojtac a ex tik, wojtacpaxi, mantoc yelxo wal emnaquil waj t'ayex.
Palta tzin nib'ej tzin lolon yet' Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil. Tzin nib'ej tzin telaj in b'a yet'oc.
Ha ex tik, yuj eyesalwumal tze k'ub'anel tas yel. Lajan ex yet' heb' anhtum malaj wach' yochi.
Comonoc numan tzex aji, yic icha chi' scheclaji to jelan ex.
Maclejec eyab' tas ol wala', ol wal tas nab'il wuuj.
¿Am he naani to ol ex kolwaj d'ha Dios yuj eyesalwumal chi'? ¿Am he naani to ay tas ol yik' t'a he ak'oj musansatil chi'?
Tze nib'ej tzeyak'och he b'a yet' Dios, tze colan he naani.
Palta q'uinaloc tzex ch'olb'itaj yuj Dios chi', ¿tas tzex aj he naani? ¿Tzam yal eyak'an musansatil, icha tzeyutej junok anima?
Tato tze comon ak'ejoch he b'a yet' Dios he naani, ol ex stumej sik'lab'il.
Ha wal smay ol ik'an he xiwi, mato syal he tek'b'an he b'ha t'a yichanh he naani.
Ha juntzanh peka' k'ayb'ub'al tzeyala', malaj yelk'ochi, lajan icha junok muro nab'a lu'um skak'och yipoc ko k'ool.
Axo ticnaik, tz'inec xe chi to ol in lolonoc, taxonhej scot t'a wib'anh yuj tas ol wal tik.
Wach'chom scotxonhej t'a wib'anh, palta ol walnhej.
Wach'chom yuj chi' tzin smilcham Dios, palta ol wak'nhejoch yipoc in k'ool. Ol in colnhej in b'ha t'a yichanh.
Talaj ata' ay in colnab'il, yujto a junok mach chuk max stek'b'ej sb'a yoch t'a yichanh Dios.
Maclejec wal eyab' tas ol aj walani.
Toxo ix in na' tas ol wutej in colan in b'a, wojtac to wach' ol in elk'ochoc.
Tato ay mach sch'oxaneli to ay in mul, syal woch waan walani masanto tzin chami.
Ach in Diosal, chab'nhej wal tas tzin k'an t'ayach, icha chi' syal in k'och t'a ichanh.
Actejxo ak'anoch in yaelal tik, manhxo in a xib'tej yet' tas ay smay.
Avtej in, ol in tak'woc t'ayach, ma jun, tzin b'ab'laj loloni, tzach tak'wi t'ayin.
Al t'ayin, ¿b'ajtil ix och in mul, ma in paltail? ¿B'ajtil ay b'aj ix in ek' t'a yib'anh chi'?
¿Tas yuj tza k'ub'ejel a b'a t'ayin? ¿Tas yuj icha junok ajk'ol tzin utej?
Lajan in icha junok xil te' tz'ik'jib'at yuj ik', ma icha anh taquinh ac. ¿Tas yuj tzak' owal wed'oc, tza nib'ej tzin a sateli?
Te ya tzal t'ayin swab'i. Tza k'anb'an t'ayin tastac in mul yictax in quelemal.
Ichato ix ak'och k'een cadena t'a woc, k'elan achnhej ochi b'aj tz'em woc.
Yuj chi' wanxo in k'ab'at icha junok tas sk'ai, ma icha junok pichul ijtacxo.
